name: TetrisJump!
description:
Projct fot the Weekley game jam, week 20 white the theme: Connected Worlds.

To save earths last penguin from drowning due to global warming, aliens are sending help!
A Fusion of Tetris and Jump'n'Run for 2 Players, combining two game worlds for maximum chaos!

Player 1: space, a, d 

Player 2:  arrow keys and m ,n
